mapper.select: select * from dl_artifi_print_lottery where DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), "%Y-%m-%d" ) = #{currentTime}

SELECT date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) AS add_time FROM dl_artifi_print_lottery WHERE statistics_print = 0 GROUP BY date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) LIMIT 1;

SELECT group_concat( order_sn ) AS order_sn, count( * ) AS paid_count, SUM( money_paid ) AS money_paid, add_time FROM ( SELECT order_sn, date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) AS add_time, money_paid FROM dl_artifi_print_lottery WHERE statistics_paid = 0 AND date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) = #{add_time} LIMIT 30 ) a;
SELECT date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) AS add_time FROM dl_artifi_print_lottery WHERE statistics_paid = 0 GROUP BY date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) LIMIT 1;

SELECT count( * ) AS count, group_concat( order_sn ) AS order_sn, SUM( winning_money ) AS total_winning_money, add_time FROM ( SELECT o.order_sn AS order_sn, o.winning_money AS winning_money, date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) AS add_time FROM dl_order o, dl_artifi_print_lottery a WHERE o.order_sn = a.order_sn AND statistics_reward = 0 AND date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) = #{add_time} LIMIT 30 ) a;

SELECT date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) AS add_time FROM dl_order o, dl_artifi_print_lottery a WHERE o.order_sn = a.order_sn AND a.statistics_reward = 0 GROUP BY date_format( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d ' ) LIMIT 1;
